title: How to set up Fitbit Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications for AFib detection
content:
Smartwatches and fitness trackers can be a big help in improving our ability to see the state of our health, and heart health is especially important. Fitbit is now rolling out support for Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications, which can detect and notify you of signs of atrial fibrillation (AFib).

moreâ€¦

The post How to set up Fitbit Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications for AFib detection appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications can let you know if your Fitbit device detects signs of AFib. Here's how to set it up.
